net.ljcomputing.core.exception

Class RequiredValueException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • net.ljcomputing.core.exception.RequiredValueException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RequiredValueException
extends Exception
    Exception thrown when a required value is absent.
